info.name: BeSmart API
info.description:
Complete BeSmart Backend Django API collection. Covers Auth, Products, Categories, Cart, Wishlist, Orders, Shipping Addresses, Payments, Loyalty, Currency, Content, Support, Vendors, and Admin.

**Setup:**
1. Run **Auth > Login** first — token is auto-saved.
2. Set `base_url` if not using localhost:8000
3. For some requests, set `product_id`, `category_id`, `order_id`, `address_id` from responses.

item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication — Supabase-backed. Run Login first to auto-save token.

request.description: Login via Supabase. Returns user + session. **Access token is auto-saved** to `{{token}}`.
Register new user via Supabase. Email verification may be required.
Get current user profile with nested profile (full_name, phone_number, image_path, role).
Update profile. Uses ProfileSerializer for nested profile fields.
Request password reset email. redirect_to matches mobile app deep link so the emailed link opens the app. Omit for web (Supabase default).
Change password for authenticated user.
Logout and invalidate Supabase session.
List products. Query params: search, category_id, is_featured, is_on_sale, is_new_arrival, price__gte, price__lte, brand, vendor_id, ordering (price, added_date, rating).
Get single product by UUID. Set product_id from list response.
List featured products. No pagination.
List new arrival products.
List products on sale.
Search products by name, description, brand.
Get size chart for a product. From product_size_chart_assignments + vendor_size_chart_templates.
Track product view for analytics. Inserts into product_views.
List reviews for a product with summary (average_rating, total_reviews, histogram).
Create review. Auth required. Requires order_id of delivered order containing product.
List Q&A for a product with stats (total, answered, unanswered).
Create question. Auth required.
Mark Q&A as helpful. Auth required. Set qa_id from list response.
Mark review as helpful. Auth required. Set review_id from product reviews list.
Report a review. Auth required.
Log search event. Auth optional. Body: query, result_count, filters (optional).
Get popular searches, total count, recent searches. Query: start_date, end_date, limit.
List active categories. Query: search, ordering.
Get single category by UUID.
List subcategories for a category. Set category_id from list.
List products in a category. Set category_id from list.
Get user's cart with items, total_items, total_price.
Add item to cart. If same product+size+color exists, quantity is incremented. product_id = UUID from products.
Update cart item quantity. cart_item_id = UUID from Get Cart items.
Remove item from cart.
List user's wishlist items.
Add product to wishlist. One per product per user.
Remove wishlist item. wishlist_id = item id from list.
List user's orders. Paginated.
**Placeholder** — Full create-from-cart logic not yet implemented. Returns message.
Get order by ID with items.
List user's addresses. Ordered by is_default DESC, created_at DESC.
Create address. First address auto-defaults. Copy id to address_id.
Get single address.
Partial update. If is_default=true, others are cleared.
Set address as default. Returns { success: true, message }.
Delete address. 204 on success. If was default, next is promoted.
List user's saved payment methods.
Add saved card. In production use tokenization.
List user's payment transactions.
Get payment by ID.
Initiate Squad checkout for order. Returns transaction_ref and checkout_url for redirect.
Verify payment by transaction_ref. Updates order status.
Squad webhook (AllowAny). Validates and processes payment events.
Get user's loyalty points balance and tier.
List loyalty transaction history.
List available rewards (public).
Redeem points for reward. Creates voucher. reward_id from List Rewards.
List user's vouchers.
List loyalty badges (public).
List active currency rates.
Convert amount between currencies. Returns converted_amount and rate.
Get user's preferred currency.
Set preferred currency (e.g. NGN, USD, EUR).

item.name: Content
item.description: Hero, contact, support info, banners, FAQs. Public.

request.description: Get homepage hero section (single row).
Get main contact info (contact, office, social_media).
List support info. type: faq, contact, policy. Omit for all.
List active promotional banners.
List FAQs (SupportInfo with type=faq).
Admin: List all banners for management.
Admin: Create promotional banner.
Admin: List all support info/FAQs for management.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "How do I reset my password?",
    "subtitle": "Click the link in the email",
    "type": "faq",
    "icon": "help-circle",
    "order_index": 0
}

request.description: Admin: Create FAQ/support info.
List contact branches (public).
List support tickets (vendor-scoped — requires vendor account).
Create support ticket. Vendor-scoped. subject required.
Get ticket by ID with messages.
Update ticket (priority, category).
Delete ticket.
Add message to ticket.
List user's chat conversations.
Start new chat. Copy id to conversation_id.
Get conversation by ID.
Update conversation.
Delete conversation.
List messages in conversation.
Send message. message_type: text, product, image, file, quick_reply.

item.name: Vendors
item.description: Customer vendor browse + Vendor dashboard. Customer APIs are public; dashboard requires vendor auth.

request.description: List approved vendors. Copy id to vendor_id for detail/products/reviews.
List featured vendors.
Search vendors by name, description, email. q = search query.
Get vendor public profile. Set vendor_id from list.
List products by vendor.
List vendor reviews.
Create review. Auth required. One review per user per vendor.
Update your review. Auth required. Copy review id from list to vendor_review_id.
Delete your review. Auth required.
Follow vendor. Auth required.
Unfollow vendor. Auth required.

body.raw:
{
    "business_name": "My Fashion Store",
    "business_email": "store@example.com",
    "business_phone": "+2341234567890",
    "business_address": "123 Retail St, Lagos",
    "business_type": "individual",
    "business_description": "We sell quality fashion items.",
    "business_logo": "https://example.com/logo.png"
}

request.description: Register current user as vendor. business_type: individual, company, partnership, llc.
Get current vendor profile.
Update vendor profile.
Get vendor dashboard stats (total_sales, total_orders, average_rating, payout_balance).
List vendor payouts.
Request payout. Requires bank account. bank_account optional if primary exists.
List vendor bank accounts.
Add bank account. Validates via Squad. bank_code = Nigerian bank code. Copy id to bank_account_id.
Get bank account by ID.
Update bank account.
Delete bank account.
List vendor size chart templates.
Create size chart template. Copy id to size_chart_id.
Get size chart by ID.
Update size chart.
Delete size chart.
List subscription plans (public).
Get vendor's active subscription.

item.name: Admin
item.description: Admin panel APIs. Requires admin permissions.

request.description: Get system stats (total_users, total_vendors, total_orders, pending_vendors).
List admin action logs.
List admin staff (AdminUser).
Create admin user. role: super_admin, admin, moderator. Copy id to admin_user_id.
Get admin user by UUID.
Update admin user.
Delete admin user.
List app settings.
Create app setting. Copy id to setting_id.
Get setting by UUID.
Update setting.
Delete setting.
Get customer user by pk (Django user id).
Soft-deactivate user (sets is_active=False).
Get OpenAPI 3 schema.
Swagger UI (open in browser).
ReDoc UI (open in browser).
Send a message to UJUNWA AI. Returns AI response with product recommendations.
Start a new conversation with UJUNWA AI (no conversation_id).
Track a chat action for analytics.

item.name: Image Search
item.description: Search products by image using OpenAI Vision.

formdata.description: Select an image file to search for similar products

request.description: Upload an image to find matching products. Uses OpenAI Vision for analysis.

item.name: Enhanced PDP (Product Detail Page)
item.description: Additional product detail endpoints for delivery, warranty, offers, highlights, specs, posters, recommendations, and reviews summary.

request.description: Get delivery information for a product.
Get warranty information for a product.
Get active offers for a product.
Get product highlights (key selling points).
Get feature posters for a product.
Get product specifications (grouped by category).
Get similar products, from-seller products, and you-might-also-like.
Get aggregated review summary (histogram, average, total, with_media).
